Question
========
How does Quarto relate to R Markdown?

Answerlist
----------
* Quarto replaces R and does not support R Markdown documents
* Quarto is older and has fewer features than R Markdown
* Quarto is the successor to R Markdown and adds more features and languages
* Quarto is only for Python and cannot work with R

Solution
========
Quarto builds on the ideas of R Markdown and extends them across languages and features.
